attributes.action: allocate resources to enable individuals with learning disabilities to be supported to fully participate in and be visible members of the community
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Individuals with learning disbalities should each have their own allocated support worker and advocate who would support them in a person centred way to access volunteering,employment and other oppportunities in the community which would prevent individuals being placed in segregational and institutionalised services which perpetuate exclusion and isolation
